snippet: ALLEN--James Haslam. Holland Lodge No. 8 F&AM acknowledges with deep regret the death of our brother on March 16, 2016. Our sincere condolences are extended to his entire family. Christopher R. Wight, Master James W. McGovern, Secretary 1/3...
lead_paragraph: ALLEN--James Haslam. Holland Lodge No. 8 F&AM acknowledges with deep regret the death of our brother on March 16, 2016. Our sincere condolences are extended to his entire family. Christopher R. Wight, Master James W. McGovern, Secretary 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  ALLEN, JAMES HASLAM
